name: Offroad Hill Racing: Monster Truck Adventure 2016 extreme Simulator
name_original: Offroad Hill Racing: Monster Truck Adventure 2016 extreme Simulator
description:
Drive your favorite extreme monster truck and have fun of being a real offroad truck driver. Become part of the elite offroad legends and drive the most extreme monster offroad trucks you have ever driven. If you are a real fan of monster truck games and 4x4 truck racing games then you really enjoy this free to play offroad truck driver game. Start your monster truck engine and attack the hill climber mountains and deserts! The best offroad hill climb racing thrill awaits you.

While you practice the adventure of being a real offroad truck driver your main goal is to participate in the elite offroad hill racing legends. As you do some 4x4 truck racing you will experience the advanced physics and the hearth touching graphics. Monster truck games and this kind of game quality are a rare blend. Let the extreme monster truck adventure begin!

Race your monster trucks during some high speed 4x4 truck racing. The more powerups you collect and the more game levels you win make it possible to extend your extreme monster truck collection. Become part of the elite offroad legends. The extra in game features will keep you playing for many times.


KEY FEATURES
- stunning detailed extreme monster truck physics
- Cool extreme monster trucks car sounds
- Collect and unlock all the extreme monster truck vehicles
- become part of the elite offroad legends
- EPIC advanced graphics and physics
- experience the thrill of being a real offroad truck driver
